attributes.action: Say YES to an Isle of Wight tidal power plant!
attributes.additional_details: Perpetuus is a consortium that includes:- Perpetuus energy limited, TB partners LLP and Isle of wight Council. Togeather they plan to install a tidal power plant off the coast of the Isle of Wight. We believe that this is a much needed project that will provide clean energy, jobs and new technology! We, as Island residents WANT this to happen! Please give them the go ahead to get this motion passed! Thank you.
